Description: For your consideration, a very clean 2004 ESP LTD EC400AT electric guitar. This guitar is finished in dark stained mahogany with a metallic gold top. This is a Korean made model. The neck has a rosewood fret board with pearl inlays. The guitar has been freshly set up with a D'Addario 10-46 set, It sounds and plays great. The action is low and buzz free. Bent notes ring out everywhere on the neck, they don't choke out at all. The neck is straight, the truss rod works, and the frets show minor wear and have approximately 95% life remaining. The guitar has its factory installed Duncan pickups, a SH-1n 59 Model in the neck position and an SH-4 JB model in the bridge. The electronics work perfectly with no noise or scratchiness. The guitar is very clean and shows minor scratches, dents and dings consistent with 15 yrs of light use. the guitar has no breaks, cracks or repairs. it appears that a previous owner fitted the bridge with graphite saddles and changed the control knobs, otherwise this guitar is original. The guitar comes with the pictured padded Road Runner gig bag. The bag is clean, but shows wear consistent with normal use Please ask any questions before bidding or buying. I have made an honest effort to fully and accurately describe this instrument. Please look closely at the pictures and draw your own conclusions. This guitar will not disappoint. This guitar is here to sell, make me an offer! Insured shipping will be $50 in the continental US via my choice of UPS or USPS Priority Mail. I accept Paypal. I have shipped many guitars and it will be well packed in a box designed for a guitar. No international shipping due to CITES. I will accept returns. This thing is here to sell, so make me an offer. The closer you are to Georgia, the better the deal I can work out for you. It is getting very expensive to ship guitars out to far away places. Buyer pays return shipping. Original shipping charges are not refundable in the event of a refund. Thanks for playing!
